nodes.bodyText:
VANISH_IGNORES_COLLISION is calling bridge$isUncollideable and bridge$setUncollideable
https://github.com/SpongePowered/SpongeCommon/blob/9be33cf2c38e66fe8ac774503ef88f0b33d51faa/src/main/java/org/spongepowered/common/data/processor/multi/entity/InvisibilityDataProcessor.java#L66

If a player is targetable becuase VANISH_PREVENTS_TARGETING is false, should spawning also be unaffected?
